is this something that exists on many exchanges with derivatives or is it something specific to bitmex?
could you provide an example of another exchange that has a similar type in its API?

Realised Profit and Loss, Realised PNL or RPL, is a standard term in trading derivatives. (There is also UnrealisedPNL but I think that can be represented through to status PROCESSING)
I know that at least Deribit and CMC Markets (not support jet) allow trading with derivatives. Deribits explicitly calls those earning RPL in their UI. Through their API they return a type called settlement with has a field profit_loss:
{
"type":"settlement"
"timestamp":1587110300141
"session_profit_loss":4469.243150033
"profit_loss":14.925158857
"position":78675
"mark_price":169.98
"instrument_name":"ETH-PERPETUAL"
"index_price":170.06
"funding":-0.008446859
}
